actions.action: Bold text, the text of the action
actions.description: Italic text, the text giving more context to the action

requirements.custom: Just some text to display if no other requirement structure applies

rewards.custom: Just some text to display if no other reward structure applies

actions.goToBosVerse: Book of Secrets verse number to go

1-2.README: Same estructure as a verse (text, actions, rewards, etc.)

3-4.README: Same estructure as a verse (text, actions, rewards, etc.)

6+.README: Same estructure as a verse (text, actions, rewards, etc.)
